amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 115-766 to call for Medicaid, Medicare, and public health reforms to help combat the opioid crisis.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walden amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Walden.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walden amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
